thoughts.text: I can use the browse_website command to explore the website https://www.loveisrespect.org/ and learn more about creating an interactive safety plan.
thoughts.reasoning: Using the browse_website command will allow me to explore the website https://www.loveisrespect.org/ and learn more about creating an interactive safety plan. This will help me achieve my goal of learning about love.
thoughts.plan:
- Use the google command to search for more information about creating an interactive safety plan on the website https://www.loveisrespect.org/
- Use the browse_website command to explore the website
- Analyze the information on the website to learn more about love
thoughts.criticism: I should be careful not to rely solely on one source of information and make sure to consider multiple perspectives and sources when learning about a topic.
thoughts.speak: I will now use the browse_website command to explore the website https://www.loveisrespect.org/ and learn more about creating an interactive safety plan. What would you like me to search for on the website?

args.question: What is included in an interactive safety plan?
